body:
### Problem

I have had this problem multiple times with different languages, but today it started spamming this error until I restarted neovim.
So basically when I use `J` to join lines, in some cases errors are thrown. In this case, this one:

```
Error in decoration provider treesitter/highlighter.line:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Error executing lua: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/highlighter.lua:269: Invalid 'end_col': out of range
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_set_extmark'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/highlighter.lua:269: in function 'fn'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:483: in function 'for_each_tree'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/highlighter.lua:217: in function 'on_line_impl'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/highlighter.lua:298: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/highlighter.lua:292>
```

I have already [reported](https://github.com/nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter/issues/5473) this to the nvim-treesitter repo and was pointed here.

### Steps to reproduce

Take this C# file:
```csharp
using System.Globalization;
using System.Text;
using FetchRecipe.Data;

namespace FetchRecipe.Serializers
{
    public class MarkdownSerializer : ISerializer
    {
        public string Serialize(Recipe? recipe)
        {
            if (recipe is null)
            {
                return "";
            }

            StringBuilder builder = new();

            _ = builder
                .Append("# ")
                .AppendLine(recipe.Name)
                .AppendLine()
                .AppendLine(
                    @"

## Zutaten

| Einheit | "
                )
                .Append(recipe.RecipeYield ?? 4)
                .Append(
                    @"p* | Zutat |
|---|---:|---|
"
                );

            foreach (RecipeIngredient ingredient in recipe.RecipeIngredient)
            {
                _ = builder
                    .Append("| ")
                    .Append(ingredient.Unit)
                    .Append(" | ")
                    .Append(ingredient.Amount)
                    .Append(" | ")
                    .Append(ingredient.Description)
                    .AppendLine(" |");
            }
            return builder.ToString();
        }
    }
}
```

Then go to line 23 and press `J`. The error appears immediately and will keep coming up, even after pressing ENTER or any other key. The only way out is `:qa!`.

Note that pressing `J` on line 24 does not cause any errors for example. Further the error can be circumvented by going into insert mode on line 24 and pressing backspace.

### Expected behavior

It should not throw errors on joining lines.

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

v0.10.0-dev-3af59a4

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no, no treesitter

### Operating system/version

EndeavorOS Linux (Arch-Based)

### Terminal name/version

KDE Konsole 23.08.1

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

yay -S neovim-nightly-bin
